title: NWB Python Course
description: In this course, you will learn about the NWB data standard and how to interact with NWB files using the PyNWB interface. You will start from the very basics and work up to reading, writing, and interacting with a variety of different data types supported by NWB.
bio: Neurodata Without Borders: Neurophysiology (NWB:N) is a project to develop a unified data format for cellular-based neurophysiology data.
